items.sentence: Can you recommend a place to stay in Boston?
Can you remember anything at all about that?
You haven\'t yet learned to drive, have you?
You knew Tom when he was a kid, didn\'t you?
You know what Tom is capable of, don\'t you?
You look like you\'re looking for something.
You look like you\'re not feeling very well.
Today\'s a bit warmer than usual, isn\'t it?
I think you spend too much time watching TV.
I think your French has gotten a lot better.
I thought I was following your instructions.
Tom asked Mary to let him copy her homework.
Tom asked if there was anything he could do.
Tom asked me if I could lend him some money.
I always figured Tom would become a teacher.
I always have a lot of fun when I come here.
I always have trouble pronouncing that word.
I always thought that Tom was a bit strange.
Please turn in your report by next Saturday.
Please write down your contact address here.
She agreed that she would pay half the rent.
She asked me if I would be free next Sunday.
Tom believes that all men are created equal.
Tom bought a bunch of grapes and I ate them.
Tom bumped into a Mary on his way to school.
I suspect Tom won\'t go to Boston next week.
I suspect that Tom and Mary don\'t like you.
I suspect that Tom doesn\'t have to do that.
I brought something that I want to give you.
I calculated that it would cost 300 dollars.
I came down here to Florida for the weather.
I came here because I wanted to talk to Tom.
I came here to tell you something important.
Have you decided on your dissertation topic?
Have you ever worked at a restaurant before?
Have you finished your English homework yet?
He admitted that he had committed the crime.
I just want you to know I regret doing that.
I knew there was no point in talking to Tom.
Why didn\'t you say that in the first place?
Why didn\'t you tell me what you were doing?
Someone has torn two pages out of this book.
Switzerland is famous for its scenic beauty.
Tell Tom about what you did the other night.
Nobody wants to work outdoors on a cold day.
Prague is the capital of the Czech Republic.
I want that information as soon as possible.
I want this more than anything in the world.
I want to ask you about the money you found.
I want to have something to remember you by.
